probejs.rhizo_missing: Rhizo is not installed. This will partially break method/field filtering, and lead to confusing naming of most methods and fields.
probejs.download_rhizo_help: You can download Rhizo via CurseForge or Github Release page.
probejs.config.enable: Capture fired events. Changes will be applied next time you start the game.
probejs.config.keep_beaned: Keep the original form of beaned methods.
